rooms.description: Minimalist entry area with a Vastu-aligned placement ensuring positive energy flow.
Open-concept living space incorporating minimalist furniture and ample natural light. Vastu principles are followed by positioning near the north-east for positivity.
Modern kitchen with integrated dining space, designed to encourage social interaction and maintain a clear circulation path. Kitchen is positioned in the north-west per Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated fitness area with state-of-the-art equipment and ample space for exercise routines. The gym is located on the eastern side to harness morning energy.
Cozy reading nook with built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating, placed in the south-east for concentration and introspection as per Vastu.
Sleek bedroom with minimalistic design focusing on comfort. Placed in the north-west area for calm and restful sleep, adhering to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Large entry door with a minimalistic design ensuring security and ease of access.
Floor-to-ceiling window for maximum natural light, enhancing the minimalist aesthetic.
Small balcony providing an outdoor escape while respecting privacy and Vastu guidelines.
